description: This guy read about our company on the internet and decided to use our services. I think he was pretty shy and scared, not surprising for such a young man. I had to do most of the talking but his qualification was good enough and I also liked his cool looking clothes. He definitely knew how to dress. That was why I gave him a job at a clothing retailer. He looked happy about the new work until I told him about the fee that had to be paid. The guy was broke and definitely didn’t like my naughty offers that followed. Eventually, I managed to talk him into becoming my sexual toy but I had to be very careful. The office was full of people today and my secretary was sitting just next door. I had to pretend that I’m still working and fuck this cutie really quietly.
title: Dirty Scout 157
